creator: fli@bpwizard.com
text:
I am using Slide with Oracle 10g. The problem I had is:

1. I am using Slide to managemt users and roles.
2. the lenght of property-value for table properties is 255 which is not longer
   enough to hold value for property such as "group-member-set"
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 31118 ***
creator: devnull@corefandango.net
